description:
Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu that he once confronted a man, who came to Onigashima looking to get Kaido’s head. His name was Ace. The two of them engaged in a fierce battle that eventually turned into an important friendship.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le passé de Yamato. L’homme qui voulait la tête d’un empereur
Yamato no Kako: Yonkou no Kubi o Nerau Otoko
Yamato`s Past! The Man Who Came for an Emperor of the Sea!
Yamatos Vergangenheit – Der Mann, der es auf einen Kaiser absah
Прошлое Ямато! Тот, кто пришёл за головой Ёнко!
ماضي ياماتو! الرّجل الّذي أتى ساعيًا خلف اليونكو!
ヤマトの過去 四皇の首を狙う男
